results.title: Diputados MX. Pt I
results.description: Re-thinking the way in which Mexican users can find their congressman data.
results.content:
The sole purpose of this project is to rethink the UX of the ðŸ‡²ðŸ‡½  congress website.
The site has a lot of important content but it's not very intuitive for users. Especially if you are accessing through a mobile device such as a smartphone. Considering that a high percentage of the Mexican population has access to the internet via a smartphone, is important that congress data is highly accessible through this channel.

Series

**1. Data Gathering**
- Data Collection Using Python-Requests
- Data Manipulation Using Pandas
- Model Design for SQL deployment

**2. Creating a VM and Uploading Data**
- Creating an Azure VM
- Creating a Dockerfile with FastAPI, Postgresql, pgAdmin and Strapi
- Upload data to Postgresql

**3.  Designing the UX**
-  Tailwind base project
- FastAPI templating. 

**4.  Getting a Domain Name & SSL Certificates**
-  Grabbing  a name from a DNS provider
- Setting up NGINX on our VM to reverse proxies on the site
- Using Certbot to certify our domains

```python
print("Hello World!")
def write_letter():
 letter = 'Soprano'
 return letter
```
```js
console.log("Hello World!")
```
